reviews.text:
Closed at 4.20pm on a Saturday but stated to be open on google maps

Edit: came back after a week to try it and it was good. Very standard shake shack stuff.

They forgot the cheese sauce in my order but gave it immediately after i mentioned it
Best hamburger EVER!!!
Best experience at shake shack ever tbh

Wrong hours. Says its open til midnight but closed well before 11 tonight. Always seems to close way early, have tried to come on multiple occasions and its literally always closed early. Don't bother trying to come here after 7 pm honestly its a waste of time
Not open says they should be

Closed at 7:30pm on a Friday when it says midnight, no notice. Found out from the flower guy outside. A few employees were still inside and when customers tried to catch their attention to ask, they just laughed. Ok keep laughing and stay closed
pulled up at 8pm on a friday and doors were locked, no signs to indicate why, workers in there doing absolutely nothing, also the online ordering is never consistently available

It's a Shake Shack. Clean bright design, extremely helpful staff. Food takes a while since they prioritize online orders.
Pricing is the biggest issue. No combos and close to $17 for a single patty burger fries and drink.
I love SSS!! shake shack sunnyside! ppls complaints about it is just mind boggling!
The place is nice from the service is good and the food is delicious
According to your website, the gluten free bun is vegan ‚Ä¶any chance that bun will be available as an option at this location?
Great food, and great customer service. Jay was very friendly.

Great place. Javon was very great at greeting me and showing me the process on how to order. Gave me some excellent choices for food. Overall great service and experience. Please gave Javon a raise. üëçüèª
Nice spot to pick-up a smash burger and chicken nuggs fast service
Sandy is the goat!! Get her promoted, she is so sweet and helpful! She‚Äôs got a bright future ü•π
Freshly made hamburgers very delicious

Qugla was absolutely wonderful. She was so friendly with my children & gabe them crayons & coloring sheets. She brought us extra napkins & cleared the tray when we were finished & checked in to see if we needed anything. She truly went above & beyond to make it a wonderful experience. My experience at the register was good too, but she truly elevated it.

Grand Opening was yesterday so assuming it would be packed I decided to pass by today for lunch, sadly, I wasn't thoroughly Greeted or Assisted like the guests that came in after me but, it's okay. Reasons I passed by for lunch of course it's Grand Opening let alone to try the Limited Time "French Onion Soup Burger" (size wise I got was a Double) & to also try the Limited Time "Parmesan Garlic Fries" that came with a Roasted Garlic Aioli Sauce Dip. I placed my order To-Go, I would've stayed but had other errands to do. Back to the food, both items were very delicious and I would recommend them to be kept on the Menu, Full Time. Welcome to Sunnyside, Shake Shack! Overall experience was Great & you can expect future visits from me.
Nueva sucursal en el barrio, buena opci√≥n para una hamburguesa. Ahora puedes encontrar una copa vino en el men√∫.
food was great and service was even better. Staffs were all young college kids. They were all very helpful and super nice. Keep up the good work!!!
Great food, great service, super friendly and professional staff! Will be coming back frequently!
FINALLY OPEN. FOOD WAS AMAZING STAFF WAS WONDERUL. GREAT FOR SUNNYSIDE!!
Staff are pretty friendly with a nice social environment!! Good for spending some time after school or work.

Food-GOOD! Service-GOOD! With that said, I got a double smoke shack burger + cheese fries with NO DRINK and it was $20.12. This meal could not have cost more than $4.00 MAX for shake shack to produce. If I‚Äôm going to pay $20.12 for a cheeseburger and fries, I will go to The Lowery in Sunnyside, where the buns are fresh and they use Pat Lafrieda beef.  $20.12 for a fast food meal, with no drink, is criminal. This will be my first and last time supporting Shake Shack. Take your money to local sunnyside establishments that actually care about the community and price their food fairly. What a waste.

Came to the grand opening FINALLY , amazing the energy great fully packed the neighborhood been waiting for this.

Food FRESH
Staff amazing and friendly

The shack is back happy for the neighborhood üòú the food was delicious and that banana pudding shake was amazing definitely my favorite. Definitely going to hit a PR the next time I go to the gym. Protein gains on point now
Owner of the gym next door had me go get burgers. He hit a PR right after. His bench was crazy. Deadlift flew woohoo üí™
Wait 30 min just a burger and it was cold
Web Site says open Today. Wasted a chunk of my lunch-break time going there,  only to be told "Private party only" WHY DIDN'T THE WEBSITE SAY THAT? No regard shown for customers.
Not open, misleading
opens 9/24 yall
The time is upon us gentlepeople, for us to feast upon the delicacy that they shall provide for us.
hello i‚Äôm hungry open up
Wasn‚Äôt the store supposed to be open by now?! It‚Äôs clearly not open yet with Fedex notices on the door. (Guessing current reviews are bots) üò¢‚Ä¶
best burgers ever
